title: pessat for btech?
content:
I was trying to register and I saw this. Why aren't they conducting pessat for btech??
Also does anyone know if it is compulsory to register at this time?

comments.body:
Forget pessat


Admission through comedk????


Bro ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ fck this why wasn't it this year

Easy af

You hv all the top cllgs participating aswell

If not Pes you'll get msrit or bmsce

Comedk lower fees aswell
so you're saying I should register through comedk too? man I thought pessat would be easiest but idk why they removed it for btech next year

Yeah. Mkc pessat

You hv pes in comedk that's a huge advantage

Msrit and bmsce cutoffs are gonna fall

If I'm not wrong under 5k rank(comedk) you'll get cse/cse spec In msrit/bmsce / pes ec


Lower fees aswell
Yeah they discontinued PESSAT from this year on. Try through COMEDK

I'm seeing everyone saying that comedk is a good choice to take

Do I register for comedk through their website??

nah this year comedk was too tough. regret not writing 2nd board exam. dont make the blunder of thinking comedk is easier. if ur from state board and u study consistently u can get better rank in cet than comedk. trust me. well pessat was full on ace for me.
hey bro have some doubts can i dm you
From next year pes admissions r through jee and cet
I think No Kcet for Karnataka and for outside Jee Mains, Written on their websiteÂ
I just checked and you're right but why?? what about the people who already paid registration fee ?
